title: Strengthening System Design Practical Competencies: QIPS-Integrated Capability Enhancement Program for Medical Professionals

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Analyze quality improvement (QI) cases from actual medical settings and develop improvement plans
Design improvement projects applying the PDCA (Plan-Do-Check-Act) cycle based on patient safety incident cases
Develop performance measurement indicators (KPIs) and quantitatively report results based on team-based QIPS projects conducted during the training period
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
